About

The Story

I'm Derick, the guy behind sideHSTL Creative. I'm a versatile freelance creative based in California's Capital City and have been practicing design and web development collectively for over 12 years.

Originally, I wanted to be a filmmaker, but the cost of film school and 2008's recession never fully allowed that to come to fruition. So I shifted gears and enrolled in a Design program here in Sacramento.

After college, I initially focused primarily just in print design. But after seeing 2010's The Social Network in theaters with some friends, I got inspired to persue web development and taught myself how to code.

I've been creating, designing, building, shooting, and editing ever since.

A designer who codes

...a Coder who designs, and shoots. It really just depends what type of project I'm tackling, or the type of project that lands in my lap.

In the past I've worked at small startups, to full-service agencies that have had an impressive roster of clients.

I've tackled projects ranging from quick weekend jobs, to full fledge web applications who's development phase spanned several months.

I've gotten to work with clients all accross the US and even with some of the big boys over in the Bay Area. I'm truly greatful for some of the opportunities that have come my wayâ€”and for the opportunites yet to introduce themselves.

Want to work together?
